00063 #include "DataBlockWriter.h"

00067 using namespace SystemsBiologyWorkbench ;

00070 // Construction/Destruction
00072 
00080 ServiceImpl::ServiceImpl(std::string n, std::string dn, std::string c, std::string h)
00081 : mutex("service", n), uniqueName(n), displayName(dn), category(c), help(h) 
00082 {
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00089 ServiceImpl::~ServiceImpl()
00090 {
00091         unsigned int i = 0 ;
00092 
00093         while (i != methods.size())
00094         {
00095                 delete methods[i];
00096                 i++;
00097         }
00098         
00099 }
00100 
00108 void ServiceImpl::addMethod(Handler *handler, std::string signature, bool synchronized, std::string help)
00109 {
00110         methods.push_back(new MethodImpl(handler, signature, synchronized ? &mutex : NULL, help));
00111 }
00112 
00118 Handler *ServiceImpl::getHandler(std::string signature)
00119 {
00120         unsigned int i = 0 ;
00121         std::vector<std::string> sigs;
00122 
00123         sigs.resize(methods.size());
00124         while (i != methods.size())
00125         {
00126                 sigs[i] = methods[i]->getSignature();
00127                 i++;
00128         }
00129 
00130         return methods[sbwSignature::match(sigs, signature.c_str())]->getHandler();
00131 }
00132 
00138 MethodImpl *ServiceImpl::getMethod(Integer methodId)
00139 {
00140         if (methodId >= 0 && methodId < (Integer) methods.size())
00141                 return methods[methodId];
00142         else
00143                 throw new SBWMethodNotFoundException("method not found");
00144 }
00145 
00150 std::string ServiceImpl::getName()
00151 {
00152         return uniqueName ;
00153 }
00154 
00160 void ServiceImpl::addSignatures(DataBlockWriter writer)
00161 {
00162         std::vector<std::string> signatures(methods.size());
00163         unsigned int i = 0 ;
00164 
00165         while (i != methods.size())
00166         {
00167                 signatures[i] = methods[i]->getSignature();
00168                 i++;
00169         }
00170 
00171         writer << signatures ;
00172 }
